name: ShakyShaky
description:
This is an early prototype for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam

Shaky Shaky is an "Unstable" card game.

You have to mix a few materials before the time runs out.

Of course the time given for each mix is "Unstable" as well! No way to know for sure!

(It's a random number between 4 and 8 seconds)

As you add different materials to your Mix it becomes more and more "Unstable"

to the point where if your mix's "Unstability" reaches zero it will explode in your hands and deal half the damage to you instead of the opponent.

The more powerful the material you are adding to your mix the more it makes it "Unstable".

Be careful and have fun!

I hope you enjoy my game!

Change Log:

# Just added a multiplier to the instability so the game becomes a bit more challenging (2 lines)

# Fixed a bug where the player didn't take damage from self mix explosions (1 line)
